MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Mpeg4.Box CreateBox (TagLib.File file, long position);

Docs.param: A containing the box to read.
A specifying the seek position at which to start reading.
Docs.summary: Creates a box by reading it from a specified file.
Docs.returns: A containing a box, or if none was found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Mpeg4.Box CreateBox (TagLib.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header);

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Mpeg4.Box CreateBox (TagLib.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.Mpeg4.IsoHandlerBox handler);
